feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought power, you also have concealment until the start of your next turn (after any surprise round, if applicable).

feat.title: Body Fuel
feat.benefit: Once per encounter when you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Body and Mind
feat.benefit: While the fragment conjured by your shaped consciousness power is within 5 squares of you, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses.

feat.title: Bogtangle Heritage
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks.
In addition, you gain the bog hunter's poison power.

power.title: Bog Hunter's Poison
power.fluff: You carefully apply to a weapon a poison that you extracted from local flora and fauna during a rest

section.name: Target:
section.text: One weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next attack with the weapon that hits before the end of the encounter deals an extra ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

section.name: Each failed saving throw:
section.text: The ongoing damage increases by 5, to a maximum of 15.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 10, and the maximum to 25.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The initial ongoing damage increases to 15, and the maximum to 35.

feat.title: Bogtangle Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the blowgun, and your blowgun damage increases from 1d4 to 1d6.
Also, you can swap one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers for the bogtangle dart attack power.

power.title: Bogtangle Dart
power.fluff: An enemy struck by your dart feels a spreading numbness as the venom does its work

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a blowgun

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity or Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] poison damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
If the target is already slowed, it becomes immobilized until the end of your next turn instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] poison damage.

feat.title: Bola Training
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency with the bola.
When you make a Weapon attack with your bola and hit, you can forgo dealing damage to the target to immobilize it until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked prone.
In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level:

power.title: Binding Bola
power.fluff: The weights entwine the cords around your target, wrapping it so tightly that it cannot maintain its momentum

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is also knocked prone.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the damage increases to 4[W] + Dexterity.

power.title: Bola Recovery
power.fluff: With the bola back in hand, you ready it for another precise throw

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must know the binding bola power

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain the use of your binding bola power.

power.title: Felling Bola
power.fluff: Such is the force of your throw, that your foe is knocked down it finds too painful stand back up again

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a bola

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage and the target is knocked prone.
The target cannot stand up from prone (save ends).

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the damage increases to 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone.
The target cannot stand from prone until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Bold Gamble
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend an action point to gain an extra action and use it to make an attack, you can choose to take a gamble. If you do, you gain a benefit based on whether the attack hits or not.
If the attack hits, the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
If the attack misses, you grant combat advantage to the target until the end of your next turn.
If your attack targets more than one creature, apply the gamble separately to each one.

feat.title: Bold Spirit
feat.benefit: When you are hit by a melee attack while you are either bloodied or granting combat advantage to the attacker, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Boldness Through Luck
feat.benefit: If an enemy has combat advantage against you and misses with a melee attack, your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Bolstered Swarm
feat.benefit: When you use your wild shape to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 10 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Admixture
feat.benefit: When you use your curative admixture class power, the target can make a saving throw to end one ongoing effect that a save can end.

feat.title: Bolstering Breath
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath's attack targets only enemies instead of all creatures in the area.
In addition, allies in the area of your dragon breath gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Bolstering Guardian
feat.benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less with a Druid attack power, one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Inspiration
feat.benefit: If an ally is adjacent to you when they use the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura power, you can take a free interrupt to either increase the healing by your Wisdom modifier or to allow the ally to make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
The increased healing becomes 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and 8 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Mantle
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend a healing surge, choose one ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle. The chosen ally can either gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Recovery
feat.benefit: When you spend one or more healing surges, you gain 5 temporary hit points in addition to any other benefits of spending that healing surge. If spending the healing surge grants you temporary hit points, instead increase the number gained by this amount.
These temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Spike
feat.benefit: When you use your mind spike class power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bolstering Touch
feat.benefit: When you use your lay on hands on an ally, the target can use your healing surge value instead of his or her own healing surge value to determine amount of healing.

feat.title: Bolstering Wind
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, each bloodied ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle regains hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
The hit points regained increase to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bonded Familiar
feat.benefit: You and your familiar can communicate telepathically out to a range of 10 squares. You must have line of sight and line of effect to your familiar to communicate with it in this manner.
At 11th level, you can communicate out to a range of 50 squares. You can communicate out to a range of 10 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect.

At 21st level, you can communicate out to a range of 1 mile. You can communicate out to a range of 50 squares as long as you have either line of sight or line of effect, and to a range of 10 squares even if you have neither.

feat.title: Boon of the Made
feat.benefit: When you use your elan resilience power, you also gain resistance to all damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the start of the triggering enemy's next turn.
This resistance increases to 3 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Born in Darkness
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Dungeoneering and Perception checks.
In addition, you gain low-light vision.

feat.title: Born of Shadows
feat.benefit: Your origin changes to shadow.
Also, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Stealth
In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while in dim light or darkness.

feat.title: Born of the Elements
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Endurance and Intimidate checks.
In addition, you can speak, read and write primordial.

feat.title: Boundless Enthusiasm
feat.benefit: The first time during an encounter that you score a critical hit, you regain 2 power points.

feat.title: Bountiful Fortune
feat.benefit: When you use your divine fortune Channel Divinity power, you and each ally adjacent to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Bow Caster
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency in bows as an implement.

feat.title: Bow Expertise
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to Weapon damage rolls with a bow when you attack a single target that is not adjacent to any creatures.
The damage bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bow Mastery
feat.benefit: When you make a Weapon attack with a bow or crossbow, you can score a critical hit with a natural roll of 19 or 20.

feat.title: Bozak Evoker
feat.benefit: If you score a critical hit with an arcane attack power, the target falls prone.
In addition, while you are bloodied, you double your racial damage bonus from the Arcane Blood racial trait.

feat.title: Bracing Breath
feat.benefit: When you use your dragon breath racial power, you gain the following benefits until the end of your next turn:
► You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with melee powers that grant temporary hit points to you.
► You count as having spent an additional healing surge for powers with varying benefits based on how many you have spent.

feat.title: Bravo
feat.benefit: You gain training in Intimidate.
Once per encounter, you can designate one creature you can see as your prey until the end of the encounter. If your prey is a solo creature, this is (save ends).
You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and Intimidate checks against your prey.
This bonus increases to +2 when your prey is under a Fear effect from you.
In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level:

power.title: Death's Messenger
power.fluff: Your prey has an appointment with death, and your attack reminds it of the fact

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You target your prey with an at-will melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage, or +1d8 additional damage if the attack is not a Weapon attack.
On a hit, the target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the additional damage increases to +2[W], or +2d8 if the attack is not a Weapon attack.

power.title: Brutal Instincts
power.fluff: With your defiant snarl, the advantage your foes had evaporates, giving you an opening

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Any creatures flank you, or your prey gains combat advantage against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You do not grant combat advantage to the triggering creature or creatures until the end of your next turn.
If your prey was among those who triggered this power, you gain combat advantage against your prey until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Bravo's Finish
power.fluff: If your vicious assault doesn't bring your prey down, it is rattled to its core

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit your prey with an at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack, and your prey is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the triggering attack deals +4[W] damage, or +4d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack.

feat.title: Bravura Leader
feat.benefit: When an ally who can see and hear you spends an action point to make an attack, that ally can choose to make the attack with bravado.
If the ally does, he or she deals +4 additional damage with the attack, but grants combat advantage to any target of the attack until the end of his or her next turn.
The additional damage increases to +6 at 11th level, and to +8 at 21st level.

feat.title: Bravura Shroud
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains concealment until the end of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Bravura Spirit
feat.benefit: Whenever a bloodied ally chooses to benefit from your Bravura Leader feat, that ally gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the attack.

feat.title: Breath of Life
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath racial power targets only enemies for the attack.
In addition, allies within the area gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Strength modifier or your Consitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Strength modifier or your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Breath of the Gods
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath racial power counts as a divine encounter attack power for the purposes of your Covenant Manifestation feature.
In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Diplomacy checks.

feat.title: Breath-Resistant Beast
feat.benefit: Your beast companion gains resist 5 + one-half your level to the damage type of your dragon breath racial power.

If you can choose between different damage types when using your dragon breath racial power, choose one of those damage types for your beast companion to resist at the end of an extended rest. If your dragon breath racial power can deal more than one type of damage at once, your beast companion can resist a similar combination.

feat.title: Bred for Battle
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative checks.
During the first round of an encounter, you also gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and speed.

feat.title: Briar Thorns
feat.benefit: Whenever you deal ongoing damage to an enemy, the enemy is slowed until the ongoing damage ends.

feat.title: Brilliant Darkfire
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with your darkfire racial power, the target gains vulnerability to radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
This vulnerability increases to 2 + your Charisma modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Brimming Wrath
feat.benefit: When you use your furious assault racial power and have at least 1 power point, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Strength modifier.
This psychic damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Broadened Preservation
feat.benefit: You can slide one or two allies with your Covenant Manifestation.

feat.title: Broken Shackles
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 feat bonus to your Will defense.
In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against Charm and Fear effects.

feat.title: Brutal Accuracy
feat.benefit: If the rerolled attack granted by your elven accuracy racial power hits your quarry, the attack deals extra damage equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier.
This extra damage increases to 2d6 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Advantage
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a target but don't use Sneak Attack against it, your attack deals additional damage equal to your Strength modifier.

feat.title: Brutal Blades
feat.benefit: Your unarmed attack gains the Off-hand weapon property.
In addition, the damage dice for your razor storm increase from d6s to d8s.

feat.title: Brutal Brawler
feat.benefit: The damage die of your unarmed attack increases to 1d8.

Also, your damage die for spiked gauntlets increases to 1d8 and you count it as having the High Crit weapon property: additional +1[W] damage on a critical hit, increasing to +2[W] at 11th level, and to +3[W] at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Charge
feat.benefit: When you use your ferocious charge racial power, you can choose to use an encounter melee attack power instead of making a melee basic attack.

feat.title: Brutal Curse
feat.benefit: When you roll your additional curse damage, reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher.

feat.title: Brutal Ferocity
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls of the melee basic attack granted by your Ferocity racial trait.
The bonus to damage rolls increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Finish
feat.benefit: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less using an encounter or daily attack power, each enemy adjacent to you or the triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to its Will defense until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Brutal Flanker
feat.benefit: While you flank an enemy and wield a two-handed weapon, any ally making a melee attack against the flanked enemy can reroll any damage die that displays a 1. The ally can reroll each die once.

feat.title: Brutal Flurry
feat.benefit: Whenever you target only one creature with your Flurry of Blows power, the creature takes 3 extra damage.
The extra damage increases to 5 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Grappler Form
feat.benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +6 feat bonus to grab attempts.
This bonus increases to +8 at 21st level.
In addition, any target you are grabbing while in beast form grants you combat advantage.

feat.title: Brutal Reach
feat.benefit: When you are raging and wielding a two-handed reach weapon, you can reroll any weapon damage die that displays a 1 when making melee attacks.

feat.title: Brutal Ruffian
feat.benefit: When you wield a club or a mace, you treat the weapon as though it had the Brutal 1 property: reroll any damage die result of 1 until the die shows 2 or higher.

feat.title: Brutal Shroud
feat.benefit: Whenever you roll the damage for your shroud, reroll each die that shows a 1 until it shows a different number.

feat.title: Brutal Teamwork
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Weapon damage rolls when the target is adjacent to at least one of your allies. The bonus applies to melee attacks, as well as to ranged attacks with a Heavy Thrown weapon.
The bonus increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Brutal Wound
feat.benefit: When your attack deals ongoing damage and you deal Sneak Attack damage to the target, add 1 to the ongoing damage for every die of Sneak Attack damage dealt.

feat.title: Brute Force
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy with a melee Weapon daily attack, you can also push the target 1 square and knock the target prone.
The push increases to 2 squares at 21st level.

feat.title: Buckler Duelist
feat.benefit: If you gain a bonus to a defense from a Rogue power and are wielding a light shield, increase the bonus by 1.

feat.title: Buffeting Shard Swarm
feat.benefit: When you use your shard swarm racial power, you can also slide each enemy in the burst 1 square.
If you have the Expanded Shard Swarm feat, you can slide each enemy adjacent to you 2 squares instead.

feat.title: Buffeting Winds
feat.benefit: When you use your windwalker racial power, you can slide each enemy marked by you a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Building Camaraderie
feat.benefit: When you succeed on a Diplomacy check, you gain a +1 bonus to Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter. This bonus is cumulative with itself.
When you fail a Diplomacy check or a Bluff check, attempt an Intimidate check, or perform any hostile action, you lose any bonus from this feat and cannot gain the bonus again during this encounter.

feat.title: Burden of Guardianship
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power and an ally is within 2 squares of you, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier.
The ally can be within 3 squares starting at 21st level.
The temporary hit points increase to 5 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burden of Liberty
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you can teleport one ally within 5 squares of you to a square adjacent to you.

feat.title: Burden of Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
Starting at 11th level, you can choose instead to spend a healing surge to allow an ally within 5 squares of you to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge.

feat.title: Burden of Vision
feat.benefit: When you use a Nature's Aspect power, you gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Burn Everything
feat.benefit: Your arcane Fire powers ignore an amount of fire resistance. The amount equals one-half the ability modifier of the ability you use to make the attack.
The amount you ignore increases by 5 at 11th level, and by 10 at 21st level.
In addition, you treat a creature that is immune to fire as instead having resist fire equal to 15 + one-half its level.

feat.title: Burning Blizzard
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage with powers that have the Acid or Cold keyword.
This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Burning Breath
feat.benefit: Choose one creature you hit with your fire damage-dealing dragon breath racial power.
The chosen creature takes ongoing fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
This ongoing damage increases to 5 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burning Vapors
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to acid damage rolls.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.
In addition, whenever you take acid damage from an attack, each enemy adjacent to you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Burning Wrath of Phlegethos
feat.benefit: If you use your infernal wrath racial power against your oath target, your melee attacks against that target deal additioal fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.
The additional damage increases to 2 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Burst of Savagery
feat.benefit: While you are under your razorclaw shifting or longtooth shifting racial power, you can choose to end it as a free interrupt when you hit with an attack.
If you do, you deal an additional 2d6 damage to the triggering target and gain 10 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points.

feat.title: Butcher's Lure
feat.benefit: You gain the ghost sound Cantrip as a racial utility power.
In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to Bluff checks when using ghost sound to mimic specific people or sounds.

power.title: Ghost Sound
power.fluff: With a wink, you create an illusory sound that emanates from a distant location

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Ranged 15

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Ranged 20

section.name: Target:
section.text: One object or unoccupied square

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You cause a sound as quiet as a whisper or as loud as a yelling or fighting creature to emanate from the target.

You can produce nonvocal sounds such as the ringing of a sword blow, jingling armor, or scraping stone. If you produce a whisper, you can make it quiet enough that only creatures adjacent to the target can hear the words.

feat.title: Call to Glory
feat.benefit: Whenever you grant an ally an attack by using a Warlord power, that ally gains temporary hit points if the attack hits.
The temporary hit points equal one-half your level.

feat.title: Camouflage
feat.benefit: When you have any natural cover or concealment outdoors, you gain a +5 feat bonus to Stealth checks to hide.

feat.title: Carceri's Manacles
feat.benefit: When an enemy ends its turn adjacent to a creature you have summoned, it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Careful Summoner
feat.benefit: Creatures summoned by your powers gain a +1 bonus to all defenses.

feat.title: Carrion Eater
feat.benefit: You gain a +4 feat bonus to saving throws against Poison effects, and to Endurance checks to resist disease.

feat.title: Cascading Doom
feat.benefit: When you affect more than one enemy with your maledictor's doom Channel Divinity power, each enemy affected gains vulnerability to all damage equal to twice the number of enemies affected. The vulnerability lasts until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Cascading Rush
feat.benefit: Whenever you push a target with bull rush, you can also push one enemy adjacent to that target 1 square.
The second enemy can be adjacent to the target either before or after you resolve the bull rush.

feat.title: Cast Afar the Spirit
feat.benefit: When you switch your familiar into active mode, you can teleport it 5 squares.

feat.title: Cast Aside
feat.benefit: Whenever a Medium or smaller creature succeeds in escaping from being grabbed by you, you can use an opportunity interrupt with the following effect:
Effect: You cancel the shift that would normally be part of the escape, and slide the target 3 squares.

feat.title: Cast Iron Font
feat.benefit: When you succeed at a saving throw against a Poison effect at the start of your turn, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Censure's Grip
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against your oath target and hit it with an Avenger power, the target cannot shift away from you until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 21st level, each square of movement away from you the target takes costs an additional square of movement.

feat.title: Centered Intuition
feat.benefit: When you roll initiative, you can roll twice and use either result. If you roll the same number both times, you can choose gain a +5 bonus to the check.

feat.title: Centered Master
feat.benefit: Your centered flurry of blows can slide each target 2 squares instead of 1.

feat.title: Champion of Nature
feat.benefit: Each time you take a short rest and expend at least one healing surge to regain hit points, choose an aspect of nature that you aren't currently manifesting.
You can use the chosen aspect's power in addition to your current aspect's power. You can't use this feat to gain additional uses of the same aspect of nature power.

feat.title: Champion of Raam
feat.benefit: In addition to regaining the use of your fell might, whenever you drop an enemy you have cursed to 0 hit points or less, you can shift a number of squares equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier.

You can also expend your fell might to augment any power associated with this feat. When you hit an enemy with an augmented such power, the target cannot include you as a target in its attacks until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Champion of the Bloody Circle
feat.benefit: You gain training in your choice of Intimidate or Streetwise.
In addition, you gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate and Streetwise checks.

feat.title: Champion's Countenance
feat.benefit: While you are at maximum hit points, allies that can see you gain a +2 bonus to their Fortitude, Reflex and Will defenses.
Allies also gain this bonus until the start of your next turn when you use your second wind to become non-bloodied.

feat.title: Changeling's Mark
feat.benefit: You can expend your changeling trick racial power to mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn. This replaces the power's normal target and effect.

feat.title: Channel Might
feat.benefit: After you use a Channel Divinity power, you gain a +1 power bonus to the next melee attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Channel of Faith
feat.benefit: You gain the Cleric Channel Divinity power divine fortune and a Channel Divinity power from one of your domains.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Invocation
feat.benefit: You gain an Invoker Channel Divinity power corresponding to one of the Divine Covenants, and a Channel Divinity power corresponding to your deity.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Valor
feat.benefit: You gain the Paladin Channel Divinity powers divine mettle and divine strength.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channel of Vengeance
feat.benefit: You gain the Avenger Channel Divinity power divine guidance and a Channel Divinity power corresponding to your deity.
If you don't have the Channel Divinity feature, you gain it. You can now use a single Channel Divinity power each encounter.

feat.title: Channeled Battlerage
feat.benefit: When you hit with a melee attack, you can choose to lose all temporary hit points to reroll the damage and gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of healing surges you have expended.

feat.title: Charging Admixture
feat.benefit: When you use your curative admixture power, the target gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls on charge attacks until the end of your next turn.
The damage bonus increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Charging Aegis
feat.benefit: When you use a charge attack and hit the enemy, you can use your aegis on it as a nonaction reaction before you turn ends.
If you do so, the penalty to attack rolls imposed by your mark is -3 instead of -2.

feat.title: Charging Rampage
feat.benefit: When your Savage Rampage feat triggers, you can choose to charge instead of making a melee basic attack.

feat.title: Cheetah's Speed
feat.benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 bonus to speed, or a +2 bonus when you run or charge.
While you are bloodied, these bonuses increase to +2 and +4, respectively.

feat.title: Child of Fire
feat.benefit: Whenever an attack bloodies you or knocks you unconscious, one enemy of your choice within 2 squares of you takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
The fire damage increases to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Child of Stone
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind while on an earthen or stone surface, you also gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Child of the Maelstorm
feat.benefit: Whenever you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you gain a +2 bonus to your next saving throw during this encounter.

feat.title: Child of the Sea
feat.benefit: You gain a swim speed equal to your speed.
In addition, you gain Aquatic keyword. In aquatic combat, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.

feat.title: Child of Wind
feat.benefit: Whenever you run or charge and are not wearing heavy armor, you ignore difficult terrain.

feat.title: Chill of the Grave
feat.benefit: Your dark reaping racial power gains Cold keyword and deals cold damage in addition to necrotic damage.

feat.title: Chilling Oath
feat.benefit: When you use your oath of enmity class power, the target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Chilling Presence
feat.benefit: When you use your winter's shroud heritage power, you can deal 5 cold damage to the triggering enemy instead of teleporting.
This damage increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Chosen Defender
feat.benefit: Enemies adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls on opportunity attacks against your allies.
Starting at 21st level, the penalty applis to all triggered attack rolls.

feat.title: Clarified Instincts
feat.benefit: The bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks granted by your Mantle of Clarity increases by one-half your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Clarifying Infusion
feat.benefit: When you use a Healing Infusion power, the target can make a saving throw against a dazing or dominating condition that a save can end.

feat.title: Clarifying Presence
feat.benefit: When an ally within your telepathy range makes a saving throw against an effect that dazes, dominates or stuns, he or she can roll twice and use either result.

feat.title: Clarity of Spirit
feat.benefit: When you use your bastion of mental clarity racial power, you or one ally in the burst can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

feat.title: Claw Fighter
feat.benefit: You have claws on both hands which count as weapons that are in the light blade weapon group, have the Off-hand property and a +3 proficiency bonus, and deal 1d6 damage.
You can wield a claw as a weapon when you aren't holding anything in the hand.
Your claws can be enchanted and disenchanted as a single weapon. Your claws do not turn to dust when disenchanted.

feat.title: Cleanse the Madness
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage against aberrant creatures.
This bonus increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cleansing Challenge
feat.benefit: When you use your divine challenge class power to mark an undead creature, you also deal 3 radiant damage to that creature.
The radiant damage increases to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cleaving Axe
feat.benefit: Once per round when you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or less with an axe, you can make a melee basic attack as a free reaction.

feat.title: Clever Control
feat.benefit: Whenever you target two or more creatures with a close or area attack power and only hit one of those creatures, the attack deals 1d6 extra damage.
The extra damage increases to 2d6 at 11th level, and to 3d6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Clever Tail
feat.benefit: Once per round as a free action, you can draw or stow an object weighing 1 pound or less with your tail.

You can use your tail to make Thievery checks, including using thieves' tools, even without using your hands. If you have your hands and tail available when making a Thievery check, you gain a +2 bonus to the check.
This feat does not give you the ability to make attacks with your tail.

feat.title: Cliffwalk Shifting
feat.benefit: While you are under your razorclaw shifting or longtooth shifting racial power, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.

feat.title: Clinging Radiance
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with a divine attack power that has the Radiant keyword, the target loses any concealment or total concealment it has and cannot gain concealment or total concealment until the end of your next turn.
Also, the target's space is dimly lit until the end of your next turn.
This increases to brightly lit, and spaces adjacent to the target being dimly lit.

feat.title: Clinging Vines
feat.benefit: You gain a climb speed equal to one-half your speed.
The climb speed increases to your speed at 21st level.

feat.title: Clobbering Brawler
feat.benefit: When you use an unarmed strike to make a melee basic attack against a creature and you score a critical hit, you also daze that creature until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Close the Gap
feat.benefit: When you roll initiative, each ally within the radius of your Ardent Mantle can shift 1 square as a free reaction.
Starting at 21st level, they can shift 2 squares.

feat.title: Close to Death
feat.benefit: When you are bloodied, you can use your shadow step without meeting its requirement.

feat.title: Closing Advantage
feat.benefit: When you use a ranged or area Swordmage power and hit at least one target, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with melee Swordmage powers until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Closing Pledge
feat.benefit: When you hit your oath target with a ranged attack, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as a free reaction. You must end this shift closer to the target than you started it.

feat.title: Cloud of Poison
feat.benefit: Your cloud of darkness racial power gains the Poison keyword. When a creature other than you starts its turn within your cloud, it takes poison damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier.
The poison damage increases to 6 + your Intelligence or Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Cloying Darkness of Maladomini
feat.benefit: When an enemy hits you with a melee attack while you have concealment granted by your Shadow Walk, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Clutch of Darkness
feat.benefit: Your cloud of darkness racial power becomes a close burst 2 instead of burst 1.
Your darkfire racial power becomes ranged 15 instead of ranged 10.

feat.title: Coincidental Success
feat.benefit: Once per encounter when you make a skill check as part of a skill challenge, choose highs or lows.
If the result of the d20 roll is within the chosen range, you earn one success for that skill challenge regardless of the check result itself.

feat.title: Cold Adaptation
feat.benefit: You gain cold resistance equal to one-half your level (minimum 1).

feat.title: Collapse under the Crust
feat.benefit: When you knock a creature prone with your earthshock racial power, you can choose the remove the creature from play until the start of that creature's next turn.

feat.title: Combat Anticipation
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to all defenses against attacks made at least 5 squares away from you.

feat.title: Combat Casting
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks triggered by using Swordmage ranged and area powers.
In addition, when you use a Swordmage melee power, you do not provoke opportunity attacks for using arcane ranged and area powers until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Combat Commander
feat.benefit: The bonus to initiative granted by your Combat Leader feature increases by one-half your Intelligence modifier, one-half your Wisdom modifier, or one-half your Charisma modifier, whichever is highest.

feat.title: Combat Intuition
feat.benefit: Whenever you miss an enemy with a melee attack, you gain a +2 bonus to triggered attack rolls against that enemy until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Combat Medic
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Heal checks.
Also, you can administer first aid to stabilize a dying creature as a minor action instead of a standard action.

feat.title: Combat Opening
feat.benefit: When you use your enforce challenge class power, you can choose to let an ally make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy as a free interrupt instead of the power's normal effects.
The ally must be able to take actions to make the attack.

feat.title: Combat Opportunist
feat.benefit: Whenever one of your allies hits an enemy with an opportunity attack, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Combat Reflexes
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls on opportunity attacks.
Starting at 11th level, this bonus applies to all triggered attack instead.

feat.title: Combat Virtuoso
feat.benefit: When you use any attack power gained through multiclassing, paragon multiclassing, or the Half-elf Dilettante racial trait, you can use Charisma for the attack rolls instead of the ability modifier normally used to make the attack.
You still use the normal ability score to determine damage, if any.

feat.title: Command Undead

prereq.name: Channel Divinity power that targets undead

feat.benefit: You gain the command undead Channel Divinity power.

power.title: Command Undead
power.fluff: You compel an undead creature to become your slave for a moment

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Close burst 10

section.name: Target:
section.text: One undead creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You slide the target up to a number of squares equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
The target makes a melee basic attack against one target of your choice.

Until the end of your next turn, any enemies that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes damage equal to 5 + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target's melee basic attack has a damage type, this damage is of the same type or types.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 8 + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 11 + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Commander's Memory
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally within 10 squares of you makes an attack roll, saving throw, or skill check, you can expend your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power as a free interrupt to add the power's bonus to the roll.

feat.title: Commanding Form
feat.benefit: Once per round while you are in beast form, you can use a free action to give one of your summoned creatures a command that normally takes a minor action.

feat.title: Commanding Vow
feat.benefit: Whenever you subject an enemy adjacent to you to your Divine Sanction, you can slide that enemy 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Common Cause
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally within 10 squares of you uses his or her second wind, that ally also gains 4 temporary hit points.
The temporary hit points increase to 8 at 11th level, and to 12 at 21st level.

feat.title: Component Integration
feat.benefit: For each warforged component you have, your warforged resolve racial power grants you 1 additional temporary hit point.
These additional temporary hit points increase to 2 for each component at 21st level.

feat.title: Concealing Shades
feat.benefit: When you use your dark reaping racial power, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gains concealment until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Concussive Breath
feat.benefit: When you use your Thundering Breath feat, you also daze each target that you hit with your dragon breath racial power.

feat.title: Conflagration Breath
feat.benefit: When you use your dragon breath that deals fire damage, you can choose to give it the Zone keyword and make its area a zone of flames that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Each creature that starts its turn in or enters the zone takes fire damage equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier. A creature a can only take this damage once per turn.
If your dragon breath racial power's attack only targets enemies, this zone also only affects enemies.

feat.title: Confounding Luck
feat.benefit: When you use your second chance racial power and the triggering attack misses, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Confounding Technique
feat.benefit: You can use a move action to switch places with an adjacent ally. This counts as a shift for both of you.

If one of you has a larger space than the other, he or she can choose how to position as long as as long as he or she covers all of the other's previous space. The one with the smaller space can position himself or herself anywhere inside the larger one's previous space.

feat.title: Confusing Distraction
feat.benefit: When you use your distract class power, you don't trigger an opportunity attack from the target, and the target also cannot take opportunity actions while it is affected by the power.

feat.title: Connected
feat.benefit: When you make a Streetwise check, you can roll twice and take the higher result.

feat.title: Constrictors Grasp
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on skill checks to escape.
Whenever a creature you are grabbing while in beast form fails to escape, it takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier or Dexterity modifier.
This damage increases to 5 + your Constitution modifier or your Dexterity modifier at 11th level, and to 10 + your Constitution modifier or your Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Consuming the Weak

prereq.name: a deity with either the Destruction or Fire domain

feat.benefit: Whenever you hit a target vulnerable to or another weakness to fire with a Fire attack power from a qualifying class, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) in addition to the attack's normal effects. If the attack already causes ongoing fire damage, increase it by 5 instead.
This ongoing damage increases to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Contagious Challenge
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy marked by your divine challenge class power, you also subject one enemy adjacent to the target to your Divine Sanction. The sanction lasts until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Controlling Advantage
feat.benefit: When you pull, push or slide a target that is granting combat advantage to you, you can increase the distance by 1 square.

feat.title: Cooperative Chance
feat.benefit: You can also use your second chance racial power when an attack hits an ally within 10 squares of you.
If you do, the ally gains all the benefits from the power that you normally would.
In addition, if the triggering attack misses, you can slide that ally a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

feat.title: Coordinated Explosion
feat.benefit: When you use an Implement power that has a burst or blast area and targets either all enemies or all creatures in the area, you gain a +1 bonus to all attack rolls with the power if at least one ally is within the burst or blast.
An ally in the area can use an immediate interrupt to increase this bonus to +2 against one enemy adjacent that ally.

feat.title: Coordinated Opportunity
feat.benefit: If both you and your beast companion threaten an enemy that provokes an opportunity attack, the one that makes the attack deals +2 additional damage.
This additional damage increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Corellon's Wrath Style
feat.benefit: You gain the following benefits with at-will melee Weapon attacks against demons, drow, orcs and spiders:
► You deal an additional +2 damage.
► You add one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum +1) on attack rolls when flanking.
Also, you add your Intelligence modifier (minimum +2) as a bonus to to AC against opportunity attacks by demons, drow, orcs and spiders.
In addition, if you grant an ally a melee attack against a demon, drow, orc, or spider, he or she deals +2 additional damage.
Both additional damages increase to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Correcting Aim
feat.benefit: If you miss your quarry with an attack, you gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll against it.
If you miss your next attack, you have a +4 bonus to attack rolls against your quarry until you hit it.

feat.title: Corrosive Breath
feat.benefit: Each creature that you hit with your acid damage-dealing dragon breath racial power takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Corrupting Attacks
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit a creature with an encounter or daily attack power, that creature takes a -1 penalty to one defense the attack targeted. The penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.
If you have the Student of the Plague feat, increase the penalty to -2.

feat.title: Corrupting Presence
feat.benefit: When you use a divine encounter or daily attack power that has the Necrotic keyword, you also create a zone of corruption in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn.
Bright light in the zone is reduced to dim light.
Allies in the zone gain a +1 power bons to attack rolls with Necrotic powers.

feat.title: Cosmic Blade Channeling
feat.benefit: Once per round, when you hit with an attack using Sorcerous Blade Channeling, you gain a benefit based on your current phase. Resolve the benefit at any point of the hit effect.
Phase of the Sun: You push the target 1 square. If the attack already pushes, increase the push by 1 instead.
Phase of the Moon: You slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
Phase of the Stars: You roll a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.

feat.title: Cosmic Eye
feat.benefit: Your evil eye of the Vistani bloodline power deals fire and radiant damage equal to your Cosmic Power damage bonus, and gains the Fire and Radiant keywords.

feat.title: Cosmic Spellfury
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit at least one enemy with a Sorcerer at-will attack power, you gain a benefit based on your current phase in the cosmic cycle. This benefit applies after the attack is resolved.
Phase of the Sun: You can roll a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.
Phase of the Moon: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
Phase of the Stars: You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn or until you are hit by an attack, whichever comes first.

feat.title: Courage of the Lone Stag
feat.benefit: When you mark three or more enemies with Nature's Wrath, you gain a +2 bonus to Weapon damage rolls against creatures marked by you. The bonus lasts until the start of your next turn.
This damage bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Courageous Example
feat.benefit: Whenever you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, the next ally to make a saving throw within 5 squares of you before the start of your next turn gains a +4 bonus to that saving throw.

feat.title: Courageous Heart
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws against Charm effects and Fear effects.
This bonus increases by +1 for each member of your Team within 10 squares who is bloodied or has this feat, to a maximum of +5.

feat.title: Courageous Shooter
feat.benefit: You gain the Ranger feature Prime Shot.

feat.title: Covenant Eye
feat.benefit: As a free action, you can expend your use of Channel Divinity to regain the use of your evil eye of the Vistani power.

feat.title: Covenant of Io
feat.benefit: Your dragon breath racial power gains the Divine keyword.
In addition, when you use an Invoker at-will attack power that has a burst area of effect, you can choose to make the power a close blast 3 instead. All other effects of the power remain the same.

feat.title: Covenant of the Raven Queen
feat.benefit: When you hit an undead creature with a divine encounter or divine daily power, you gain resist necrotic equal to your Constitution modifier or your Intelligence modifier until the start of your next turn.
This resist increases to 5 + your Constitution modifier or your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Covenant Relocation
feat.benefit: When you push, pull, or slide a target with a divine power, you can add 1 square to that forced movement.

feat.title: Covered Retreat
feat.benefit: When an enemy provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can take an opportunity interrupt to slide an ally that is adjacent to the provoking enemy a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier to a square that is not adjacent to the provoking enemy.

Also, when you make an opportunity attack, an ally adjacent to the target can use a free reaction to shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier if you hit, or half as many squares if you miss. In either case, the ally must end the shift in a square that is not adjacent to the target enemy.

feat.title: Crack the Mountain
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, the enemy is also slowed (save ends).
If the attack already slows the enemy, you instead slide the enemy 2 squares.

feat.title: Cragborn Courage
feat.benefit: When you or an ally uses the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura class power, he or she regains additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Crashing Tempest Style
feat.benefit: While you are wielding a club, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage deals by your Flurry of Blows power.

feat.title: Creation Mastery
feat.benefit: Three times per day, you can perform a ritual on half the normal time if that ritual normally requires between 1 minute and 24 hours to perform.
Also, you can perform the enchant magic item ritual as if your level was two higher.
In addition, if you have the Alchemist feat, you can make alchemical items as if your level was two higher.

feat.title: Crew Savvy
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to Athletics check to climb.

Also, whenever you make a Dungeoneering check, or an Athletics check to climb, one ally adjacent to you gains a +2 bonus the next time he or she makes the same kind of check before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Crimson Eye Action
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point, you subject your assassin's shroud target to an additional shroud.

feat.title: Crimson Fire
feat.benefit: Against a creature under your divine challenge or Divine Sanction, you use d10s for your curse damage.

feat.title: Crimson Legionnaire
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with Paladin powers against creatures under your curse.
This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Crippling Crush
feat.benefit: When you immobilize or slow an enemy with a Weapon attack using a hammer or mace, that enemy takes +2 extra damage.
This extra damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Critical Ambush
feat.benefit: If you score a critical hit with a weapon that you can Sneak Attack with, you can apply your Sneak Attack dice as critical dice. You can do this even if you do not have combat advantage or have already used your Sneak Attack this turn.
This does not allow you to deal Sneak Attack twice to the same target on the same attack.

feat.title: Critical Breath
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit with your dragon breath racial power, the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
The ongoing damage is the same type (or types) as the damage from your breath.
The ongoing damage increases to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Critical Curse
feat.benefit: If you score a critical hit with a Warlock power, you can apply your Warlock's Curse dice as critical dice. You can do this even if the target is not cursed by you or you have already used your curse this turn.
This does not allow you to deal your Warlock's Curse damage twice to the same target on the same attack.
On the same turn that you score a critical hit, you can curse that target even if it is not the enemy closest to you.

feat.title: Critical Reserve
feat.benefit: Once per encounter, when you score a critical hit with an at-will psionic power that is unaugmented, you regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Critical Targeting
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a melee or ranged attack, the attack deals +2 extra damage and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that creature until the end of the encounter.
Both bonuses increase to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Critical Understanding
feat.benefit: When you use your ardent surge class power, a bloodied target gains a +3 bonus to all defenses instead of a +1 bonus.

feat.title: Crossbow Caster
feat.benefit: You gain proficiency in crossbows as an implement.

feat.title: Crossbow Expertise
feat.benefit: You ignore partial cover and superior cover with Weapon attacks you make with a crossbow.

feat.title: Crow's Flight
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.
Also, you ignore difficult terrain when you run or charge.

feat.title: Cruel Cut
feat.benefit: When you make a melee basic attack on your turn and have combat advantage for the attack, on a hit the target also takes ongoing damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (save ends).
The ongoing damage increases to 3 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Cruel Shroud
feat.benefit: You have combat advantage against targets subject to at least two of your shrouds.

feat.title: Cruel Whimsy
feat.benefit: When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect bestowed by one of your arcane powers, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Crusader's Fury
feat.benefit: While you are adjacent to a bloodied ally, your opportunity attacks deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Crusading Wrath
feat.benefit: When you use your divine strength Channel Divinity power, the next enemy you attack before the end of your next turn is subject to your Divine Sanction until the end of the encounter.
While it remains subject to this sanction, add your Wisdom modifier to the damage it takes from the Divine Sanction.

feat.title: Crushing Doom
feat.benefit: When you target an enemy with your maledictor's doom class power, the enemy takes a penalty to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier unil the end of your next turn.
The penalty increases to 2 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Crushing Earthstrength
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you gain a bonus to Weapon damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
The bonus increases to 2 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Crushing Grab
feat.benefit: Each round you sustain a grab on your turn, the target takes damage equal to 4 + your Strength modifier.
This increases to 8 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Crushing Guardian
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with hammer and mace weapon attacks while in Guardian Form.
This increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Crushing Mace
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with melee basic attacks made with a mace.
This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Crushing Pin
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy grabbed by you attempts to escape the grab and fails, it takes damage equal to 5 + your Dexterity modifier.
This damage increases to 10 + your Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Crystalline Auger
feat.benefit: Your attacks ignore 5 points of resist psychic.
This increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cull the Weak
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a bloodied or weakened enemy, you gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls against that enemy.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Cunning Artifice
feat.benefit: You can make an Arcane check instead of a Bluff check as part of your changeling trick racial power.
Also, when you use an Artficer melee attack power and hit an enemy granting you combat advantage, that enemy grants combat advantage to your allies until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Cunning Stalker
feat.benefit: You gain combat advantage against an adjacent enemy when it is the only creature adjacent to you and you are the only creature adjacent to it.

feat.title: Cunning Wrath
feat.benefit: If you have combat advantage against the target of your infernal wrath racial power, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
This additional damage increases to 3 + your Dexterity modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Curse of Displacement
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit against a creature under your curse, you can teleport it 3 squares as a free reaction.

feat.title: Curse of Doom Ensured
feat.benefit: When you hit or miss an enemy under your curse, that enemy grants combat advantage for the first attack one of your allies makes against it. The attack must come before the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Curse of Io's Blood
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, your Warlock's Curse deals additional damage equal to your Strength modifier.
This additional damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Curse of the Blind Stars
feat.benefit: When you hit a foe under your curse with a Radiant encounter or daily Warlock attack, you can forgo dealing your curse damage to instead cause the target to become blinded until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Cursed Advantage
feat.benefit: You gain combat advantage against bloodied enemies under your curse.

feat.title: Cursed Shadow
feat.benefit: On your turn, when you have concealment from the Shadow Walk feature, you are insubstantial.
Also, you can use shadow step without meeting the requirement, but must end the teleportation adjacent to a creature under your curse.

feat.title: Cursed Spells
feat.benefit: Your curse damage increases by an ability modifier depending on your pact:
Dark Pact: Dexterity modifier.
Fey Pact: Dexterity modifier.
Infernal Pact: Constitution modifier.
Star Pact: Intelligence modifier.
Vestige Pact: Intelligence modifier.
Sorcerer-King Pact: Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Cutthroat
feat.benefit: You gain training in the Stealth skill.
Also, you can use a minor action instead of a standard action to make a Bluff check to create a diversion to hide.
In addition, you can learn the following powers as multiclass powers of the indicated level:

power.title: Sudden Retaliation
power.fluff: Faster than the eye can follow, you retaliate against those attacking you or your allies

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in the Intimidate skill

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy targets you or an ally

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an at-will melee or ranged attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Level 17:
section.text: If you know this power as an encounter attack power of 17th level or higher, the attack you make deals an additional +1[W] damage, or an additional +1d8 if it is not a Weapon attack.

power.title: Cutthroat's Scrutiny
power.fluff: Studying your opponent, you search for a weakness you can take advantage of

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature you can see

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Until the end of the encounter, while you have combat advantage against the target, you can score a critical hit against it on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

power.title: Quick Kill
power.fluff: You slip from the shadows unseen, striking before the enemy knows what happened

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit with a creature that cannot sense your current location with an at-will melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals an additional +2[W] damage, or an additional +2d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack.

section.name: Level 25:
section.text: If you know this power as a daily attack power of 25th level or higher, the triggering attack deals an additional +6[W] or +6d8 damage instead.

feat.title: Cyclone Spirit
feat.benefit: When you or an ally pushes, pulls or slides a target and the target starts the forced movement adjacent to your spirit companion, increase the distance by 1 square.
Starting at 21st level, you can increase the forced movement by 1 square as long as target passes through a square adjacent to your spirit companion.

feat.title: Cyclone Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain training in one skill from the Fighter's class skill list.

Once per encounter as a free action on your turn, you can gain a +1 bonus to melee and close Weapon damage rolls until the end of your current turn. You must be wielding two melee weapons and wearing chainmail, light armor or no armor to gain this benefit.
This damage bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dakshai's Body-Mind Union
feat.benefit: When you are subected to an effect that a save can end, you can expend your iron mind racial power as an immediate interrupt to make a saving throw against the triggering effect with a +5 bonus. If you do, you do not gain the normal benefits of the power.

feat.title: Dancing Leaves
feat.benefit: When you use your warden's grasp class power, you can teleport 2 squares to a square closer to the triggering enemy instead of sliding it. The power otherwise has its normal effect.
This increases to teleport 3 squares at 21st level.

feat.title: Dancing Thorn Style
feat.benefit: While wielding a longsword, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with Monk attack powers.
Also, if you wield a longsword in two hands, you add +1 to the damage dealt by your Flurry of Blows power.

feat.title: Danger Sense
feat.benefit: When you make an initiative check, roll twice and take the higher result.

feat.title: Daredevil Inspiration
feat.benefit: When an ally use the Draw Inspiration action of your warlord's aura, he or she can choose take advantage of this feat.

If the ally does, he or she deals +4 additional damage with the next attack he or she makes before the end of his or her current turn, but grants combat advantage to all attackers until the start of his or her next turn.
The additional damage increases to +6 at 11th level, and to +8 at 21st level.

feat.title: Daring Warrior
feat.benefit: You gain the following benefits with at-will Martial attacks:
► If an enemy hits you with an attack triggered by your movement, you gain a +1 bonus to damage against that creature until the end of your current turn.
► If an enemy hits you when it has combat advantage for the attack, you gain a +1 bonus to damage against that creature until the end of your next turn.
These bonuses stack with each other. Both bonuses increase to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dark Feasting
feat.benefit: When you deal damage with your dark reaping racial power, you gain temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage that the target took.

feat.title: Dark Fury
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with powers that have the Necrotic or Psychic keyword.
This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dark Invitation
feat.benefit: When you apply the damage from your dark reaping racial power to a creature, you can pull that creature a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier or your Intelligence modifier, whichever is higher (minimum 1 square).

feat.title: Dark Mantle
feat.benefit: When you use your healing word class power, you can choose to forgo the additional dice of healing to instead grant the target resist 5 necrotic until the end of your turn.
This resistance increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 20 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dark Thaumaturgy
feat.benefit: Each time you complete an encounter without using your Action Point, you gain a +2 cumulative bonus to all skill checks related to performing a ritual.

feat.title: Darkened Soul
feat.benefit: You gain the shade form Assassin class power.

feat.title: Darkening Mind
feat.benefit: You can spend 1 power point to augment your shadow jaunt racial power to add 2 squares to the distance you can teleport and to remain insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Darkfire Dancer
feat.benefit: If you are adjacent to a target affected by your darkfire racial power, you can shift 2 squares when you step.
If you use a power that allows you to shift while you are adjacent to a target affected by your darkfire racial power, you can shift 1 additional square.

feat.title: Darkfire Implement
feat.benefit: When you hit a target with your darkfire racial power and are wielding an implement you are proficient with, the target takes damage equal to twice your implement's enhancement bonus.
This damage increases to 2 + twice your implement's enhancement bonus at 11th level, and to 4 + twice your implement's enhancement bonus at 21st level.

feat.title: Darkfire Reaper
feat.benefit: When you reduce the target of your darkfire racial power to 0 hit points or less with a melee or ranged attack, you regain the use of darkfire.

feat.title: Darkfire Strike
feat.benefit: When you target a creature marked by you with a melee attack, you can use your darkfire racial power against that creature as a free interrupt. Using darkfire in this way doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for using a ranged power.

feat.title: Darkfire Targeting
feat.benefit: Whenever you you deal Sneak Attack or Hunter's Quarry damage to the target of your darkfire racial power, you deal additional damage equal to the ability modifier you use for your darkfire's attack roll.
This additional damage increases to 2 + ability modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + ability modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Darkfire Vitality
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally hits an enemy that is under the effect of your darkfire racial power, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Darkness Reign
feat.benefit: As long as you are within your cloud of darkness racial power, you can sustain it as a standard action.
Beginning at 21st level, you can sustain it as a move action.
Each time you sustain the power, it lasts until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Darkness's Wings
feat.benefit: You gain darkvision.
Also, as a free action on your turn, you can expend your shade form class power to regain the use of your shadow jaunt racial power.

feat.title: Darkwinter Wild Soul
feat.benefit: You can choose cold or necrotic instead of rolling a d10 for your Wild Soul feature.

feat.title: Darren Gambler
feat.benefit: When you reroll an attack roll, a skill check, or an ability check, you can choose to use this feat.
If you do, you gain a +2 bonus to the roll. However, if the second result is less than the first, you grant combat advantage to all attackers until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Darting Shade
feat.benefit: Whenever you take damage from an attack while under the effects of your shade form class power, you can use your shadow step class power as a free reaction.

feat.title: Daughter's Promises
feat.benefit: Your dark one's blessing class power changes from personal to special, and you replace the effect with the following:
Effect: Each enemy within 1 square of the triggering enemy takes fire damage equal to 5 + one-half your level, and you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level.

feat.title: Daunting Breath
feat.benefit: Each creature you hit with your dragon breath racial power is marked by you until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Daunting Challenge
feat.benefit: Creatures marked by you take a -3 penalty, instead of the normal -2, to attack rolls for any attack that doesn't include you as a target.

feat.title: Daunting Swarm
feat.benefit: You can choose to mark any creature you affect with your shard swarm racial power.

feat.title: Dawn Hunter Training
feat.benefit: You can use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll a damage roll instead of an attack roll. If you do so, you must reroll all the dice, and use the higher of the two totals.

feat.title: Dazing Fist
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, you also daze the enemy (save ends).
If the attack already dazes an enemy, it instead deals 5 additional damage.
This additional damage increases to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Dazing Fury
feat.benefit: When you hit with your warden's fury class power, instead of granting combat advantage, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Dazing Rebuke
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit an undead creature with your turn undead Channel Divinity power, you can choose to make the target dazed instead of immobilized.

feat.title: Deadeye Slinger
feat.benefit: You treat slings as having a +3 proficiency, and the High Crit weapon property.

feat.title: Deadly Axe
feat.benefit: You treat all axes you are proficient with as having the High Crit weapon property.
If an axe already has the property, you deal an additional +1[W] damage on a critical when you wield it.

feat.title: Deadly Draw
feat.benefit: Whenever you pull or slide an enemy to a square adjacent to you, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Deadly Immobilization
feat.benefit: Whenever you slow or immobilize a target with a Swordmage attack power that deals damage, that power deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Deadly Rage
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls while raging.
This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Deadly Rebuke
feat.benefit: When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power, you also add your Intelligence modifier to the damage roll of the power that gains the bonus.

feat.title: Death Curse
feat.benefit: When you deal the additional necrotic damage from your dark reaping to a target under your curse, all other creatures under your curse take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
This damage increases to 2 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Death Scorned
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to death saving throws.
Also, you don't die from failing death saving throws until you have failed a number of death saving throws equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Death Sight
feat.benefit: Bloodied enemies do not gain the benefit of concealment against your attacks.
Starting at 11th level, bloodied enemies also do not gain the benefit of cover against your attacks.

feat.title: Death Veil
feat.benefit: When you use your shade form class power, you become invisible to undead and shadow creatures for as long as the power lasts.

feat.title: Death Walk
feat.benefit: When you use dark reaping racial power, you can also use your shadow step class power as a free reaction.
The creature triggering your dark reaping counts as a creature for the purposes of this shadow step.

feat.title: Death Ward
feat.benefit: When you use a Channel Divinity power on your turn, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain resist necrotic equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier until the start of your next turn.
Starting at 21st level, you and each ally within 10 squares gains the benefit.
The resistance increases to 8 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Death Wastes Nothing
feat.benefit: When you use your dark reaping racial power, you can move any shrouds upon the triggering creature to one enemy within 10 squares of the triggering creature.

feat.title: Death's Blessing
feat.benefit: You no longer need to eat, drink, or breathe, so you never need to make Endurance checks to resist the effects of starvation, thirst, and suffocation.
Also, you are no longer considered a living creature.

feat.title: Death's Grasp
feat.benefit: You gain the following augmentation for your mind spike class power:
Augment 1
Effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Beginning at 21st level, you also gain the following augment:
Augment 2
Effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes necrotic damage equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Death's Pall
feat.benefit: While you are adjacent to a creature subject to one or more of your shrouds, you have concealment from all creatures that are not subject to your shrouds.
If the adjacent creature is subject to three or more of your shrouds, you have total concealment instead of concealment.

feat.title: Death's Quickening
feat.benefit: If you drop to 0 hit points or less and choose to remain conscious due to your Unnatural Vitality racial trait, you can take a minor action in addition to the standard action Unnatural Vitality allows.

feat.title: Deathless Warrior
feat.benefit: If an attack would reduce you to 0 hit points or less, you reduce the damage by 4 + your Constitution modifier. This stacks with any resist you have that applies.
This reduction increases to 8 + your Constitution modifier against melee attacks.

feat.title: Deathly Disruption
feat.benefit: Your attacks ignore 5 points of necrotic resistance.
This increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Deathward Aegis
feat.benefit: When you reduce damage with your aegis, the protected ally also gains resist 5 necrotic until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.
This increases to resist 10 at 11th level, and to resist 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Debilitating Breath
feat.benefit: Each target hit by your poison damage-dealing dragon breath racial power is weakened until the end of your next turn.
A creature can be affected both by this feat and your Toxic Breath feat.

feat.title: Deception Mastery
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Bluff checks.
Also, when you would normally make a skill check or use a skill check modifier as part of a deception ritual, you can use Bluff instead of the indicated skill.
In addition, once per day, you can ignore the component cost of a deception ritual of your level or lower that you have mastered.

feat.title: Deceptive Mind
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to all defenses while your battle resilience class power is in effect.

feat.title: Deceptive Staff
feat.benefit: Whenever you miss an enemy with a melee attack using a staff, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Deep Durability
feat.benefit: When you use your stone camouflage racial power, you gain 3 additional temporary hit points for each enemy marked by you.
These additional temporary hit points per enemy increase to 5 at 11th level, and to 7 at 21st level.

feat.title: Deep Gash
